title: Security Contracts
headline: Security Contracts
subtitle: Build Your Agency’s Clientele with Security Contracts
content:
Agency owners can log into the Agency Network and take on Security Contracts.

Recover valuables and vehicles, conduct daring rescue operations, defend high-value assets and more. Completing Security Contracts will reveal the Agency’s dirtier work with Payphone Hits.

The more contracts you complete, the more cash your firm brings in daily.
